name: Mecha Bots
description:
This game was developed during 30h for the 2nd Facebook Game Jam that happened during Brazil's Independent Games Festival (BIG). 

Developers

  • Carolina Scoponi - Artist
  • Elizeu Emanuel - Programmer
  • Leonardo Kelvin - Programmer
  • Natalia Ciocchetti - Artist
  • Renata Rapyo - Designer
